projects.title: Gym Equipment E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for gym equipment featuring product browsing, cart management, secure authentication with Spring Security, role-based admin dashboard control, responsive Thymeleaf views, and optimized PostgreSQL persistence using JPA/Hibernate.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: A backend hospital management system handling doctors, patients, services, and appointment scheduling with structured JPA/Hibernate entity design, transactional business logic, and optimized queries ensuring data consistency and integrity.

projects.title: Docx to PDF Converter
projects.description: A web-based document conversion service that transforms uploaded .docx files into downloadable PDFs, featuring validated file uploads with Multer, secure temporary file handling with automatic cleanup, and reliable server-side document processing.
